page.title: 03FARMING & ARMED FORCES
page.content: The area is primarily mixed woodland surrounding a valley that features Kingsbarn Farm.The latterfunctions as a horse training centre for 15_20 horses.The owner buys horses between 4-5 years of age,trains them and sells them world wide.The farms size is 25 acres.The farm house is made of brick and flint and was built in the late 19th.century. {MINISTRY OF DEFENCE CAMP} The camp covers 45 acres.There is a Naffi,play school,a doctors surgery held once a week and a secondhand clothes shop.There are 240 houses on the camp inhabited by the American and British Air Forces and military police.At the present time 70 houses are empty.
